headline: How Trump’s Iran strike just made your stock portfolio great again
summary: Take a close look now at U.S. manufacturers, semiconductor producers, agricultural exporters, cybersecurity firms and defense contractors.

headline: Trump says U.S. has launched attack on Iran nuclear sites as investors brace for ‘unpredictable spillovers’ across markets
summary: President Donald Trump announced late Saturday the U.S. had joined Israel’s attack on Iran’s nuclear sites, putting the country in the middle of a Middle Eastern war and setting up a potentially volatile market reaction.

headline: How Trump’s big bill will directly impact your wallet — from paying your taxes and healthcare to raising a child and owning a home
summary: As the Senate debates the tax bill, here’s what’s at stake for your family and workplace.
